items.title: Rising Inflation, and the Supreme Court’s ‘Shadow Docket’
items.description: Plus, why that e-book cost your library $50.

items.title: As Iran Deports a Million Afghans, ‘Where Do We Even Go?’
items.description: Afghans being forced out of Iran are grappling with an uncertain future in Afghanistan, where widespread poverty and severe restrictions on women and ...

items.title: Afghan Women and Girls Deported From Iran Fear Returning to Afghanistan
items.description: “Get ready to cope” was the message from an aid worker to women returning to Taliban rule in Afghanistan after their expulsion from Iran.

items.title: Supreme Court Keeps Ruling in Trump’s Favor, but Doesn’t Say Why
items.description: In a series of terse, unsigned orders, the court has often been giving the green light to President Trump’s agenda without a murmur of explanation.

items.title: Public Media Can Be a Lifeline. Gutting It Hurts Everyone.
items.description: Abandoning local public radio and TV would accelerate a dangerous trend straining civic health.
